snippet: In a blunt interview with The Atlantic, Hillary Clinton shattered an image of unity with the president, criticizing his “Don’t do stupid stuff” approach.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton's comments criticizing not just Pres Obama's refusal to aid rebels in Syria, but also his shorthand description of his entire foreign policy, shatters image of unity she and Pres Obama had cultivated; situation suggests that Clinton is more ready to distinguish her views from Obama's in advance of possible presidential campaign in 2016.
lead_paragraph: In a blunt interview with The Atlantic, Hillary Clinton shattered an image of unity with the president, criticizing his “Don’t do stupid stuff” approach.

headline.main: A Rift in Worldviews Is Exposed as Clinton Faults Obama on Policy
headline.print_headline: A Rift in Worldviews Is Exposed as Clinton Faults Obama on Policy
